translations.import_error_no_data: The imported object does not contain any data

translations.open_current_lyrics: Open the current song's lyrics in a new tab
translations.open_lyrics: Open this song's lyrics in a new tab
translations.lyrics_rate_limited-1:
You are being rate limited.
Please wait a few seconds before requesting more lyrics.
translations.lyrics_rate_limited-n:
You are being rate limited.
Please wait %1 seconds before requesting more lyrics.

Couldn't find a lyrics page for this song.
Do you want to open genius.com to manually search for it?
translations.lyrics_not_found_click_open_search: Couldn't find lyrics URL - click to open the manual lyrics search

The lyrics cache currently has %1 entry.
Do you really want to delete them?
translations.lyrics_clear_cache_confirm_prompt-n:

Do you really want to delete them?
translations.lyrics_cache_changed_clear_confirm:
You have changed settings that affect the data in the lyrics cache, which breaks lyrics URL lookups.
Do you want to clear the cache now?
translations.hotkey_input_click_to_change_tooltip: Click, then press the desired key combination
translations.open_config_menu_tooltip: Click to open the configuration menu
translations.feature_help_button_tooltip: Click to get more information about this feature
translations.welcome_text_line_2: I hope you enjoy using %1 as much as I enjoyed making it üòÉ
translations.welcome_text_line_3: If you like %1, please leave a rating on %2GreasyFork%3 or %4OpenUserJS%5
translations.welcome_text_line_4: My work relies on donations so please consider %1donating ‚ù§Ô∏è%2
translations.welcome_text_line_5: Found a bug or want to suggest a feature? Please %1open an issue on GitHub%2
translations.new_version_available:
A new version of %1 is available!
You currently have version %2 installed and you can update to version %3
translations.reenable_in_config_menu: (can be re-enabled in the configuration menu)
translations.expand_release_notes: Click to expand the latest release notes
translations.collapse_release_notes: Click to collapse the latest release notes
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderLabel: Add a percentage label next to the volume slider
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderSize: The width of the volume slider in pixels
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderStep: Volume slider sensitivity (by how little percent the volume can be changed at a time)
translations.feature_desc_volumeSliderScrollStep: Volume slider scroll wheel sensitivity in percent - snaps to the nearest sensitivity value from above
translations.feature_helptext_volumeSliderScrollStep:
By how much percent the volume should be changed when scrolling the volume slider with the mouse wheel.
This should be a multiple of the volume slider sensitivity, otherwise there will be small irregular jumps in the volume when scrolling.
translations.feature_desc_watermarkEnabled: Show a watermark under the site logo that opens this config menu
translations.feature_helptext_watermarkEnabled:
If this is disabled, you can still open the config menu by clicking the option in the menu that opens when you click your profile picture in the top right corner.
However it will be harder to find the easter egg ;)
translations.feature_desc_removeShareTrackingParam: Remove the tracking parameter "&si" from links in the share popup
translations.feature_helptext_removeShareTrackingPara: For analytics purposes YouTube adds a tracking parameter to the end of the URL you can copy in the share menu. While not directly harmful, it makes the URL longer and gives YouTube more information about you and the people you send the link to.
translations.feature_desc_numKeysSkipToTime: Enable skipping to a specific time in the video by pressing a number key (0-9)
translations.feature_desc_fixSpacing: Fix spacing issues in the layout
translations.feature_helptext_fixSpacing: There are various locations in the user interface where the spacing between elements is inconsistent. This feature fixes those issues.
translations.feature_desc_lyricsQueueButton: Add a button to each song in a queue to quickly open its lyrics page
translations.feature_desc_deleteFromQueueButton: Add a button to each song in a queue to quickly remove it
translations.feature_desc_listButtonsPlacement: Where should the queue buttons show up?
translations.feature_helptext_listButtonsPlacement: There are various song lists on the site like album pages, playlists and the currently playing queue. With this option you can choose where the queue buttons should show up.
translations.feature_desc_scrollToActiveSongBtn: Add a button to the queue to scroll to the currently playing song
translations.feature_desc_disableBeforeUnloadPopup: Prevent the confirmation popup that appears when trying to leave the site while a song is playing
translations.feature_helptext_disableBeforeUnloadPopu:
When trying to leave the site while a few seconds into a song that is actively playing, a popup will appear asking you to confirm that you want to leave the site. It might say something along the lines of "you have unsaved data" or "this site is asking if you want to close it".
This feature disables that popup entirely.
translations.feature_desc_closeToastsTimeout: After how many seconds to close permanent notifications - 0 to only close them manually (default behavior)
translations.feature_helptext_closeToastsTimeout:
Most popups that appear in the bottom left corner will close automatically after 3 seconds with the exception of certain ones like when liking a song.
This feature allows you to set a time for those permanent popups to be closed.
The other kind of popups will stay unaffected.
Set this to 0 for the default behavior of not closing permanent notifications.
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTime: Remember the last song's time when reloading or restoring the tab
translations.feature_helptext_rememberSongTime-1:
Sometimes when reloading the page or restoring it after accidentally closing it, you want to resume listening at the same point. This feature allows you to do that.
In order to record the song's time, you need to play it for %1 second, then its time will be remembered and be restorable for a short while.
translations.feature_helptext_rememberSongTime-n:
Sometimes when reloading the page or restoring it after accidentally closing it, you want to resume listening at the same point. This feature allows you to do that.
In order to record the song's time, you need to play it for %1 seconds, then its time will be remembered and be restorable for a short while.
translations.feature_desc_rememberSongTimeSites: On which sites should the song time be remembered and restored?
translations.feature_desc_lockVolume: Force the volume slider to stay at a specific level
translations.feature_desc_lockVolumeLevel: What volume level to lock the volume slider at
translations.feature_desc_arrowKeySupport: Use arrow keys to skip forwards and backwards in the currently playing song
translations.feature_helptext_arrowKeySupport:
Normally you can only skip forwards and backwards by a fixed 10 second interval with the keys "H" and "L". This feature allows you to use the arrow keys too.
To change the amount of seconds to skip, use the option below.
translations.feature_desc_arrowKeySkipBy: By how many seconds to skip when using the arrow keys
translations.feature_desc_switchBetweenSites: Add a hotkey to switch between the YT and YTM sites on a video / song
translations.feature_helptext_switchBetweenSites: Pressing this hotkey will switch to the other site if you are on YouTube or YouTube Music while staying on the same video / song.
translations.feature_desc_switchSitesHotkey: Which hotkey needs to be pressed to switch sites?
translations.feature_desc_anchorImprovements: Add and improve links all over the page so things can be opened in a new tab easier
translations.feature_helptext_anchorImprovements: Some elements on the page are only clickable with the left mouse button, which means you can't open them in a new tab by middle-clicking or through the context menu using shift + right-click. This feature adds links to a lot of them or enlarges existing ones to make clicking easier.
translations.feature_desc_geniusLyrics: Add a button to the media controls of the currently playing song to open its lyrics on genius.com
translations.feature_desc_geniUrlBase: Base URL of your geniURL instance, see https://github.com/Sv443/geniURL
translations.feature_helptext_geniUrlBase:
If you have your own instance of geniURL running (for example to bypass rate limiting), you can enter its base URL here to use it for the genius.com lyrics button.
If you don't know what this is, you can leave this option as is.
translations.feature_desc_geniUrlToken: Auth token for your geniURL instance
translations.feature_helptext_geniUrlToken: To bypass rate limiting, you can provide an auth token that is also defined in the .env file of your geniURL instance
translations.feature_desc_lyricsCacheMaxSize: Maximum amount of lyrics to keep in the cache
translations.feature_helptext_lyricsCacheMaxSize:
The lyrics of songs you listen to are stored in a cache to reduce the amount of requests to the lyrics provider.
This feature allows you to set the maximum amount of lyrics to keep in the cache.
When the limit is reached, the entry that was used last will be removed to make space for any new ones.
translations.feature_desc_lyricsCacheTTL: Max amount of days to keep a lyrics entry in the cache
translations.feature_helptext_lyricsCacheTTL:
The cache that lyrics are stored in will automatically delete them after this amount of time to ensure that updates to the source are being fetched sooner or later.
If you wanna make sure that you always have the most recent lyrics, set this to a low value like 4 days.
translations.feature_helptext_clearLyricsCache: If the lyrics that are in the local cache are outdated or you just want to free up some space, you can clear the cache manually by pressing this button.
translations.feature_desc_lyricsFuzzyFilter: Experimental: Enable fuzzy filtering for the lyrics search
translations.feature_helptext_lyricsFuzzyFilter:
Fuzzy filtering allows you to find lyrics even if the song title or artist name is misspelled or slightly different from the actual title or artist name.
This feature is experimental and might not work as expected.
translations.feature_helptext_versionCheck:
This feature checks for updates every 24 hours, notifies you if a new version is available and allows you to update the script manually.
If your userscript manager extension updates scripts automatically, you can disable this feature.
translations.feature_desc_checkVersionNow: Manually check for a new version
translations.feature_desc_logLevel: How much information to log to the console
translations.feature_helptext_logLevel:
Changing this is really only needed for debugging purposes as a result of experiencing a problem.
Should you have one, you can increase the log level here, open your browser's JavaScript console (usually with Ctrl + Shift + K) and attach screenshots of that log in a GitHub issue.
translations.feature_helptext_advancedMode:
Show advanced settings in the configuration menu after reloading the page.
This is useful if you want to more deeply customize the script's behavior.
